ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats can sail on me.
🐳 Whales live here.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🐢 I am slow.
🦀 Some of my cousins pinch!

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and have lots of teeth. Be careful!

hints.text: 🐟 I eat fish.
🦈 I am a type of fish
🦷 Some people are scared of me.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🐠 I swim near coral.
🎨 My colors help me hide.

ocean.question: I am very big and sing songs. I am a mammal, and swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 Some people say I sing.
🌊 I breathe air, even though I live in the ocean.
🐳 I am the biggest animal on Earth!

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have many arms, but no bones.
✒️ I can make the water dark with ink.
🧠 I am very smart.

ocean.question: I am a type of shellfish that makes a shiny pearl inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I have a shell that protects me.
💎 I can make something pretty and valuable.
💍 People wear my creations.

ocean.question: I look like a star and live on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have points like a star in the sky.
🖐️ I can grow back my arms if I lose one!
✨ I am not a fish.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that hides in the sand and can shock other animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I look a little bit like a snake.
⚡ I can give a zap!
🏖️ I hide in sandy places.

ocean.question: I am a very small animal that lives in a shell or without one. I am eaten by whales and many other sea creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🦐 I am a tiny crustacean.
🐋 Whales love to eat me!
🌊 I float around with the currents.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me!

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
💛 My skin is the color of the sun.
🐒 I'm a tasty treat for monkeys.

food.question: I am round and red (or green!) and often juicy. You can eat me raw or make juice from me.

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on trees or bushes.
😋 Many people like to eat me as a snack.
🥤 You can make a healthy drink from me.

food.question: I am long and orange and rabbits love to eat me. I'm good for your eyes!

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me.
👁️ I help you see in the dark.

food.question: I am white and you drink me with your breakfast. Cows give me to us!

hints.text: 🥛 I am liquid.
🐮 I come from an animal.
🥣 You can pour me on your cereal.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. You can eat me by themselves or in a salad!

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
🌱 I grow from a seed.
🥗 I'm often eaten with lettuce and tomatoes.

food.question: I'm a dessert that's cold and sweet. You can eat me in a cone or a cup!

hints.text: 🍨 I'm often kept in the freezer.
🍦 I come in many flavors like chocolate and vanilla.
👅 People like to lick me.

food.question: I am made of dough and baked in the oven. You can put butter or jelly on me.

hints.text: 🍞 I am often eaten at breakfast.
🔥 You need heat to make me.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am a fruit that's long and curved. I am sweet when I ripen.

hints.text: 🌳 I grow in bunches.
🍌 Monkeys and other animals love to peel me.

food.question: I am a popular food, often served with ketchup. I am made from potatoes and am long and crispy!

hints.text: 🥔 I come from underground.
🍟 You can find me at a fast food restaurant.
🧂 People love to add salt to me.

food.question: I am a dish made of rice, vegetables, and often meat or seafood. I am popular in many Asian countries.

hints.text: 🍚 Rice is my main ingredient.
🥢 You might eat me with chopsticks.
🌏 Different countries have different versions of me.
